features: 【Easy to Assemble】This chest of drawers for bedroom is designed with a child-friendly anti-tipping device to ensure maximum safety. The pre-installed drawer tracks make assembly a breeze, without the need to distinguish between the left and right drawers. Plus, the clear, step-by-step instructions make dressers & chests of drawers installation easy and hassle-free

【Ample Storage Space】Made of high-quality MDF and PB wood, this white dresser is durable, sturdy, and built to last. The closet dresser measures 46.6 inches wide, 25 inches high, and 15.7 inches deep, offering ample storage space for clothes, toys, and diapers

【Durable & Sturdy】With a 70-pound weight capacity on the top surface, this small dresser is perfect for your bedroom, closet, living room, or entryway. Its modern and sleek design features striped texture panels and gold handles, adding a touch of luxury to your space. Whether you're looking for a dresser for bedroom or a nursery dresser, this mid century modern dresser fits the bill

【Modern Minimalist Design】Upgrade your bedroom with the white and gold dresser – the perfect combination of simplicity and luxury. The dresser for nursery offers practicality without sacrificing style. Perfect for any décor style, this dresser is the ultimate storage solution

【Trustworthy Quality】Each piece of our products passes strict inspection process which gives customers multi guarantee. White dresser 6 drawer will be packed securely with thick foam and corner protectors for safe delivery

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on December 24, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Beautiful and well made
reviews.reviewText: I’d been eyeing this dresser since we moved into our new apartment and finally bought it for myself for Christmas. It is absolutely gorgeous, fits perfectly where I wanted it and is surprisingly well made considering the price. It took my partner and I a little over an hour to put together. I found the instructions to be very straightforward and easy to follow and all the parts were clearly labeled. So happy with this purchase. I’ll likely get some of the other matching pieces to go with it.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on December 30, 2023
reviews.reviewText: Assembly not too bad, really nice looking, sturdy and the drawers slide nicely. I spray painted the handles to make them black too.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 31, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Beautiful,easy to assemble
reviews.reviewText: The media could not be loaded. This was easy to assemble, and each part is labeled with a numbered sticker. I assembled it in 40 minutes, and it looks beautiful and sturdy. I believe it can be used in the kitchen or any room.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on September 6, 2023
reviews.reviewText: We ordered 2 of these and they are great quality. We were able to put them together with ease. All parts were there and in perfect condition. Love the height of these dressers but the depth of the drawers could be bigger. Doesn't seem to hold much unfortunately.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on July 13, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Sleek and functional
reviews.reviewText: The dresser was straightforward to build. It was a little time intensive, but the result is sturdy and attractive. I love the texture of the front of the drawers and the matte finish of the hardware: it has a durable feel. I’d call it a medium sized dresser, but after comparing it to a very spacious three drawer dresser from a well known Scandinavian big box store, I think the overall space is comparable (which will more than adequately meet my needs). The dresser has just enough style to make it interesting, but not so over done as to look cheap or gaudy; I feel the style would work in a number of different style rooms, which is great. Loving this purchase!

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on November 30, 2023
reviews.reviewText: There was a small dent on dresser sides when I received them.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on August 19, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Really beautiful dresser but hard to build
reviews.reviewText: Its a beautiful dresser with 6 draws and fits perfect in my bedroom. Building it was a mission but it got done, you need 2 people to build and the instructions are a little off. You might have to be a little creative while building. Quick tip, instructions shows you have to hang the dresser on the wall but i switched up, above I have a photo of how I keep the back board hold steady without hanging it on the wall.Overall it’s a great dresser and pairs perfect with my bed frame So I high recommend.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on December 31, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 3.0 out of 5 stars Cute but small & scraped
reviews.reviewText: Dresser was scratched and scraped when I received it. Beautiful style just came damaged which was a bummer.
